name: Veggie Get 'Chicken of the Eight Flames'
name_original: Veggie Get 'Chicken of the Eight Flames'
description:
You're a chicken and you've awoken having laid an egg. This time however, the egg is making a request; "Collect Veggies, Veggie Get!". 

What are these flames? What is happening to the egg??  Aliens???

Dive in to this simple and addicting platformer to find out! 

Unlock raptor claws and more! How fast can YOU collect all of the veggies?
